description: Sequence information for custom genomic ranges, stored in a CSV file following the [**comservatory**](https://artifactdb.github.io/comservatory) specification (version 1). This contains a data frame with one row per reference sequence in the custom annotation. It has at least the columns `seqnames` (string), `seqlengths` (integer), `isCircular` (boolean), and `genome` (string).

is_child.description: Is this a child document, only to be interpreted in the context of the parent document from which it is linked? This may have implications for search and metadata requirements.

path.description: Path to the file in the project directory.

compression.description: Type of compression applied to the file.

title: Sequence information
